casebody.data:
Ronald GUNN, Respondent/Cross-Appellant,
v.
HOLLEY PERFORMANCE PRODUCTS, INC., Appellant/Cross-Respondent. No. ED 106744 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION THREE. Filed: July 16, 2019 FOR APPELLANTS, W. Bevis Schock, 7777 Bonhomme Avenue, Suite 1300, Clayton, Missouri 63105. FOR RESPONDENT/CROSS-APPELLANT, Jonathan C. Pleban, 2010 South Big Bend Boulevard, St. Louis, Missouri 63117. Before Sherri B. Sullivan, P.J., James M. Dowd, J., and Robin Ransom, J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

Holley Performance Products, Inc., appeals the judgment entered after a jury trial finding that it was strictly liable for failing to warn of a defect in its product. Ronald Gunn cross-appeals.

We affirm. Because an extended opinion would have no precedential value, the parties have been furnished with a memorandum for their information only, setting forth the reasons for this order pursuant to Rule 84.16(b).
